General.Name: ATFS Project
General.Description:
ATFS Project aims to create a decentralized AgriTech & Food Science platform leveraging the Ethereum blockchain. The platform will support the development of a Smart Farm that will be powered by IoT technology, sensors, and analytic software. That technology will enable to automatically control the proper temperature, humidity, and sunlight for the nourishments just to name a few. Additionally, on the smart farm the team aims to produce Plant-based meat (vegetable protein) using biotechnology and synthetic biology.

ATFS is an ERC-20 token that will benefit the users as shareholders of 20% of the ATFS LAB profits.

ICO.Description:
ATFS Project aims to create a decentralized AgriTech & Food Science platform leveraging the Ethereum blockchain. The platform will support the development of a Smart Farm that will be powered by IoT technology, sensors, and analytic software. That technology will enable to automatically control the proper temperature, humidity, and sunlight for the nourishment just to name a few. Additionally, on the smart farm the team aims to produce Plant-based meat (vegetable protein) using biotechnology and synthetic biology.

ATFS is an ERC-20 token that will benefit the users as shareholders of 20% of the ATFS LAB profits. 

Team:

  • David KIM: Chief Executive Officer, Founder.
  • Jay CHOI: Chief Operating Officer, Co-Founder.
  • Austin H. CHUNG: Chief Financial Officer, Co-Founder.
  • Han REW: Graphic Designer & Web Developer.
  • Anthony KIM: Software Developer.
  • Rachel CHUNG: Marketing Planner.

ATFS Project will be holding its ICO on the 10th of January, 2017. The ICO token supply represents 65% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 247,000,000 tokens available, for 0.0002 ETH each during the offering. The ICO funding target is 12,500 ETH, the funding cap is 50,000 ETH and is expected to end on the 9th of February, 2017 or when the funding cap is reached. Any unsold/remaining tokens will be burned.

Token Reserve Split (35%):

  • 15% Reserved;
  • 10% Founders and Management Team;
  • 5% Future hired;
  • 3% Bounties;
  • 2% Advisers;

ATFS Project ICO will feature escrow contracts, bonus program, bounty campaign, and the token will not be mineable.

Bonus Structure:

  • 1st-3rd Day - 40% Bonus: 1 ETH = 7000 Tokens;
  • 4th-8th Day - 30% Bonus: 1 ETH = 6500 Tokens
  • 9th-15th Day - 20% Bonus: 1ETH = 6000 Tokens;
  • 16th-22nd Day - 10% Bonus: 1ETH = 5500 Tokens;
  • 23rd-27th Day - 5% Bonus: 1ETH = 5250 Tokens;
  • 28th-30th Day - 1 ETH = 5000 Tokens ;
